LanguageData.KryptonianPowersDesc: Manage Superman-inspired abilities fueled by sunlight.
LanguageData.KryptonianHeatVisionMenuDesc: Select an intensity for Kryptonian heat vision.
LanguageData.KryptonianHeatVisionDesc: Project a controllable beam of solar flame at {0} intensity. Click to begin, hold left mouse to steer, and release to stop.
LanguageData.KryptonianHeatVisionActive: {0} unleashes heat vision. Hold left mouse to guide the beam; release to stop.
LanguageData.KryptonianFlightDesc: Toggle flight, ignoring terrain and moving faster while draining solar energy.
LanguageData.KryptonianIceBreathDesc: Freeze a cone ahead, stunning enemies and extinguishing flames.
LanguageData.KryptonianCellophaneSDesc: Stun a target for 5 seconds with a binding solar construct.
LanguageData.KryptonianXRayVisionDesc: Reveal the map within 30 tiles permanently.
LanguageData.KryptonianSupernovaDesc: Release all stored solar energy in a catastrophic explosion.
LanguageData.KryptonianBackDesc: Return to the previous Kryptonian menu.
LanguageData.KryptonianSupernovaConfirm: Release all solar energy within a radius of {0} tiles? This will annihilate everything in the area.
